animeTitle: Honoo no Alpenrose: Ai no Symphony Ongaku-hen
animeDescription: A music-video style recap OVA. This release covers episode 12-20 and is with classical music entirely except for one song right before the credits. The beginning also has a unique frosted boarder frame around the video that changes designs which was not present in the the first music recap nor in the original anime.
animeRelated: ['Full story: Honoo no Alpenrose: Judy & Randy', 'Alternative version: Honoo no Alpenrose', 'Prequel: Honoo no Alpenrose: Sweet Memory Ongaku-hen']
